text: An ugly, bad slave enjoyed the love of her master. With the money he gave her, the slave adorned herself with brilliant ornaments, rivaling her own mistress. And she offered her sacrifices to Aphrodite often, to thank her for making her beautiful; but the goddess appeared to her in a dream, and said to her servant, Do not thank me for making you beautiful; for I am angry with the man whom thou seest beautiful. Your treasure could be a lack.
title: La esclava fea y Afrodita
author: nan Esopo
